ft.comm
Class SerialPort

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.comm.CommPort
        |
        +--javax.comm.SerialPort
              |
              +--ft.comm.SerialPort
final class SerialPort
extends javax.comm.SerialPort

rudimentary serial port for FischerTechnik. With ideas from the rxtx package for Linux.
